dialogue: Then I'll fire you. I'll do all the parts myself. That's all right. I got a couple of machine guns in my suitcase. I'll let you have one of them.
You know_ Baxter -- I'm doing some research at the Columbia Medical Center -- and I wonder if you could do us a favor?
Sometimes_  there's a twi-night double-header.  A nebbish like you!
I need more proof_ that's all. Anybody can get lucky once.
I could come up with 750 grand in a day if I had a reason to.
No_ I was never a Nazi_ I have no interest in politics_ I'm a musician -
Hello.  Heard about that graduation present.  Really quite a car.
Look_ I know you're busy_ you don't' have to retain me_ but you can trust me.
